oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Robert Brannon at Lookout Point
Lookout Point, Chattanooga, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two uniformed men, one holding field glasses, seated on a high boulder with brush below and a house visible in distance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Portraits
Visualizing the War
